panels.description: Maximum duration a handler has been processing a stream

targets.expr:
max by (app)
(propulsion_scheduler_busy_seconds{kind="oldest", state="active", sys=~"$sys", sub=~"$sub", app=~"$application"})

panels.title: Longest Running Stream Handler Duration

panels.description: Longest durations a stream's handling has been stuck or failing

targets.expr:
max by (app)
(propulsion_scheduler_busy_seconds{kind="oldest", state!="active", sys=~"$sys", sub=~"$sub", app=~"$application", db=~"$database"})

panels.title: Longest failing or stuck Stream Duration

targets.expr:
max by (app, group)
(rate(propulsion_scheduler_handler_seconds_count{sys=~"$sys", sub=~"$sub", app=~"$application", group=~"$group", kind!="exceptions"}[5m]))

max by (app)
(rate(propulsion_scheduler_handler_seconds_count{sys=~"$sys", sub=~"$sub", app=~"$application", kind="exceptions"}[5m]))

max by (app, group)
(propulsion_scheduler_handler_summary_seconds{sys=~"$sys", sub=~"$sub", app=~"$application", group=~"$group", kind!="exceptions", quantile="0.99"})

max by (app, group)
(propulsion_scheduler_handler_summary_seconds{sys=~"$sys", sub=~"$sub", app=~"$application", group=~"$group", kind="exceptions", quantile="0.99"})

panels.description:
Unique changed documents awaiting processing

NOTE net of read-ahead effects

targets.expr:
sum by (app, group)
(propulsion_changefeed_lag_documents{sys=~"$sys", sub=~"$sub", app=~"$application", db=~"$database", group=~"$group"})

panels.title: ChangeFeed Lag (Unprocessed Changed Documents Total)

panels.description:
Age of most recently read batch

NOTE due to read-ahead, age at the point of processing can be higher

targets.expr:
max by (app, group)
(propulsion_changefeed_age_seconds{sys=~"$sys", sub=~"$sub", app=~"$application", db=~"$database", group=~"$group"})

panels.title: CosmosDb ChangeFeed Age at Ingestion

targets.expr:
max by (app, tranche)
(propulsion_feed_position_token%1000000000)

sum by (app, group)
(propulsion_scheduler_streams{sys=~"$sys", sub=~"$sub", app=~"$application", group=~"$group", state!="synced"})

panels.description: Maximum duration a stream has been running, stuck or failing

targets.expr:
max by (state, group)
(propulsion_scheduler_busy_seconds{kind="oldest", sys=~"$sys", sub=~"$sub", app=~"$application", group=~"$group"})

panels.title: Longest Stream Handler Busy State Durations

targets.expr: max(rate(propulsion_scheduler_handler_seconds_count{sys=~"$sys", sub=~"$sub", app=~"$application", group=~"$group", kind!="exceptions"}[5m]))
max(rate(propulsion_scheduler_handler_seconds_count{sys=~"$sys", sub=~"$sub", app=~"$application", kind="exceptions"}[5m]))

max by (group, quantile)
(propulsion_scheduler_handler_summary_seconds{sys=~"$sys", sub=~"$sub", app=~"$application", group=~"$group", kind!="exceptions"})

max by (group, quantile)
(propulsion_scheduler_handler_summary_seconds{sys=~"$sys", sub=~"$sub", app=~"$application", group=~"$group", kind="exceptions"})
sum(rate(propulsion_scheduler_handler_seconds_bucket{sys=~"$sys", sub=~"$sub", app=~"$application", group=~"$group", kind!="exceptions"}[5m])) by (le)
sum(rate(propulsion_scheduler_handler_seconds_bucket{sys=~"$sys", sub=~"$sub", app=~"$application", group=~"$group", kind="exceptions"}[5m])) by (le)

panels.description: Number of streams with processing active, failing or stuck

targets.expr:
sum by (group, state)
(propulsion_scheduler_busy_count{sys=~"$sys", sub=~"$sub", app=~"$application", group=~"$group"})

panels.title: Stream Handler Busy State Counts

panels.description: Breakdown of longest and shortest durations that streams have been active, stuck or stalled

targets.expr:
max by (group, state, kind)
(propulsion_scheduler_busy_seconds{sys=~"$sys", sub=~"$sub", app=~"$application", group=~"$group"})

panels.title: Stream Handler Busy State Durations

targets.expr: sum(propulsion_scheduler_events{sys=~"$sys", sub=~"$sub", app=~"$application"}) without (app, sys, sub, job, instance)
sum(propulsion_scheduler_bytes{sys=~"$sys", sub=~"$sub", app=~"$application"}) without (sys, sub, app, job, instance)

panels.title: Propulsion Scheduler Buffers State (Total Payload Size)

targets.expr: sum(propulsion_scheduler_streams{sys=~"$sys", sub=~"$sub", app=~"$application", state!="synced"}) without (sys, sub, app, job, instance)
sum(propulsion_scheduler_cats{sys=~"$sys", sub=~"$sub", app=~"$application"}) without (sys, sub, app, job, instance)

panels.description: Provides itemized breakdown of the work being performed by the (single) synchronous loop driving a Propulsion Scheduler

targets.expr:
sum by (activity, group)
(rate(propulsion_scheduler_cpu{sys=~"$sys", sub=~"$sub", app=~"$application"}[5m]))

panels.title: Propulsion Scheduler CPU Usage Breakdown

targets.expr: sum by (group)(propulsion_scheduler_streams{sys=~"$sys", sub=~"$sub", app=~"$application", group=~"$group", state="synced"})

sum by (app, tranche)
(rate(propulsion_feed_pages_total{app=~"$application", db=~"$database"}[1m]))

sum by (app, tranche)
(rate(propulsion_feed_items_total{app=~"$application", db=~"$database"}[1m]))

panels.description: Defines the baseline position from which the read begins. The meaning of the underlying value depends on the nature of the feed

targets.expr:
max by (app, tranche)
(propulsion_feed_position_token/1000000000)

panels.title: Feed Baseline (Raw)

targets.expr:
max by (app, tranche)
(propulsion_feed_position_token%1000000000)

sum by (app, tranche)
(propulsion_feed_ingest_queue{sys=~"$sys", sub=~"$sub", app=~"$application", db=~"$database"})

sum by (app, group)
(rate(propulsion_changefeed_documents_total{app=~"$application", db=~"$database", group=~"$group"}[1m]))

panels.description:
Age of most recently read batch

NOTE due to read-ahead, age at the point of processing can be higher

targets.expr:
max by (app, group)
(propulsion_changefeed_age_seconds{sys=~"$sys", sub=~"$sub", app=~"$application", db=~"$database"})

panels.title: ChangeFeed Read Observed Age

panels.description:
Unique changed documents awaiting processing

NOTE net of read-ahead effects

targets.expr:
sum by (app, group)
(propulsion_changefeed_lag_documents{sys=~"$sys", sub=~"$sub", app=~"$application", db=~"$database"})

panels.title: ChangeFeed Lag (Unprocessed Changed Documents Total)

targets.expr:
sum by (app, group)
(propulsion_changefeed_ingest_queue{sys=~"$sys", sub=~"$sub", app=~"$application", db=~"$database"})

panels.description:
Age of most recent documents read
Note: due to read-ahead, age at the point of processing can be longer

targets.expr:
max by (app, db, con, group, rangeId)
(propulsion_changefeed_age_seconds{sys=~"$sys", sub=~"$sub"})

panels.title: ChangeFeed Read Observed Age

targets.expr:
sum by (app, db, con, group, rangeId)
(propulsion_changefeed_lag_documents{sys=~"$sys", sub=~"$sub"})

sum without (job, instance)
(rate(propulsion_changefeed_documents_total{group=~"$group", sys=~"$sys", sub=~"$sub"}[5m]))

sum by (app, db, con, group, rangeId)
(rate(propulsion_changefeed_read_ru_sum{sys=~"$sys", sub=~"$sub"}[5m]))
sum(rate(propulsion_changefeed_read_ru_bucket{sys=~"$sys", sub=~"$sub"}[1m])) by (le)

max by (app)
(propulsion_changefeed_read_summary_ru{quantile="0.99", sys=~"$sys", sub=~"$sub"})

panels.title: ChangeFeed Read Charges RU/s Total p99

targets.expr: sum without (job, instance) (propulsion_changefeed_read_summary_seconds{sys=~"$sys", sub=~"$sub", quantile="0.99"})
sum(rate(propulsion_changefeed_read_seconds_bucket{sys=~"$sys", sub=~"$sub"}[1m])) by (le)

panels.description:
In a healthy system with consumers keeping up, pauses should be minimal (ingesting should take 0ms).

If the system is working down a backlog, the buffers being full triggers a pause at the point of ingestion until such time as there is space for another batch in the buffer, whereupon the reader is released to begin the next batch of documents

targets.expr: sum without (instance, job, quantile) (propulsion_changefeed_ingest_summary_seconds{quantile="0.99", sys=~"$sys", sub=~"$sub"})

panels.title: Read-ahead Pause Interval p99

panels.description:
In a healthy system with consumers keeping up, pauses should be minimal.

Where the system is working down a backlog, pauses can occur (in fact the lack of them may suggest the read configuration can be enhanced)

targets.expr: sum(rate(propulsion_changefeed_ingest_seconds_bucket{sys=~"$sys", sub=~"$sub", group=~"$group"}[1m])) by (le)

panels.title: Read-Ahead Pause Interval Distribution
